com.bumptech.glide.resize
Interface BitmapLoadTask

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseBitmapLoadTask
public interface BitmapLoadTask

An interface for loading a bitmap.

Method Summary
 void cancel()
          Cancels any in progress load.
 java.lang.String getId()
          Returns some unique id representing the particular image being loaded (e.g.
 android.graphics.Bitmap load(BitmapPool bitmapPool)
          Returns a decoded bitmap.
 

Method Detail

getId

java.lang.String getId()
Returns some unique id representing the particular image being loaded (e.g. the image url) and any options that may be being used to transform the image (downsampling, rotation etc.) suitable for use as a cache key.

cancel

void cancel()
Cancels any in progress load.

load

android.graphics.Bitmap load(BitmapPool bitmapPool)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Returns a decoded bitmap.

Parameters:
bitmapPool - A bitmap pool that can be used to reuse bitmaps during the load. Any bitmaps generated during this load other than the one returned should be returned to the pool.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
